about_the_game:
The only time is NOW, the only way is FORWARD! So what are you waiting for?! Take your fishing experience to the NEXT LEVEL instantaneously — with the ADVANCED FP PACK! The Advanced FP Pack features FOUR powerful Advanced Edition rod and reel combos, along with awesome Advanced Edition fishing apparel — an all round basic set of superb equipment to cover all your progressive fishing needs! You also get 7-Day Pond Passes to 5 STATES and 2 European COUNTRIES: Missouri, New York, Colorado, North Carolina, Florida, as well as Czech and Netherlands along with the corresponding Advanced Fishing Licenses! As well as early monster missions unlock! So don’t waste precious time! Get the ADVANCED FP PACK and start enjoying your new Advanced Level angling experience RIGHT NOW!

Advanced Pack includes:
* 20 000 CREDITS
* 20 BAITCOINS
* 7-DAY PREMIUM
* 3 Marker Buoys
* 2 Storage Boxes (60 Slots)
* 3 Tackle Setups
* 3 Recipe Slots

RODS ‘N REELS
Rods:
* Magfin™ NightFeather™ Advanced Edition - Length: 6' 6" (2 m); Lure Weight: 1/28–1/3 Oz. (1–9 g); Power: Ultralight; Line Weight: 3–10 Lb. (1.5–4.5 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 9
* UL-CHUBER™ AllRound™ Advanced Edition - Length: 12' 10" (3.9 m); Casting Weight: 1 3/7 – 4 2/7 Oz. (40–120 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 3–11 Lb. (1.5–4.5 kg); Action: Moderate; Pieces: 3+3; Guides: 10+6; Quiver Tips: 1 Oz., 2 Oz., 3 Oz.
* Garry Scott™ AdvancedTroy™ - Length: 23' (7 m); Line Weight: 3–13 Lb. (1.5–6.0 kg); Action: Mod Fast; Pieces: 7; Guides: 10
* Magfin™ LuxCaster™ Advanced Edition - Length: 7' 3" (2.2 m); Lure Weight: 3/8-1 3/7 Oz. (10–40 g); Power: Heavy; Line Weight: 7.5–23 Lb. (3.5–10.5 kg); Action: Fast; Pieces: 2; Guides: 10
Reels:
* Magfin™ EspiraSlim™ Advanced Edition - Ratio: 5.4:1; Recovery: 31.5" (80 cm); Capacity: mono 3/100 (0.25/100), braid 6/125 (0.2/125); Max Drag: 8 Lb. (3.6 kg); Ball Bearings: 12+1; Weight: 7 Oz. (200 g); Drag: front
* UL-CHUBER™ FeederForcer™ Advanced Edition - Ratio: 4.8:1; Recovery: 32" (81 cm); Capacity: mono 32/120 (0.5/120), braid 30/205 (0.28/205); Max Drag: 10.5 Lb. (4.75 kg); Ball Bearings: 4+1; Weight: 18.5 Oz. (524 g); Drag: front
* Magfin™ EspiraML™ Advanced Edition - Ratio: 4.7:1; Recovery: 27.5" (70 cm); Capacity: mono 12/100 (0.3/100), braid 20/135 (0.23/135); Max Drag: 12.1 Lb. (5.5 kg); Ball Bearings: 7+1; Weight: 11.5 Oz.; Drag: front
* Magfin™ Counsellor™ Advanced Edition - Ratio: 6.2:1; Recovery: 29.5" (75 cm); Capacity: mono 12/120 (0.3/120), braid 20/160 (0.23/160); Max Drag: 23 Lb. (10.5 kg); Ball Bearings: 10+1; Weight: 9.2 Oz. (260 g); Brake: magnet & centrifugal

TERMINAL TACKLE
* Lines - Length 1000 yd (1000 m):
Mono .012" (0.3 mm) - Test: 12 Lb. (5.4 kg)
Braid .008" (0.2 mm) - Test: 10 Lb. (4.5 kg)
Braid .009" (0.23 mm) - Test: 20 Lb. (9.1 kg)
Fluoro .009" (0.23 mm) - Test: 8 Lb. (3.6 kg)
* Mono Leaders - Length: 2 yd (2 m):
.006" (0.16)- Test: 7 lb (3.15 kg)
.007" (0.18)- Test: 8.3 lb (3.8 kg)
.008" (0.2)- Test: 9.7 lb (4.4 kg)
* Bobber: Glowing Slim Float
* Hooks: #12; #10; #8; #4; #2; #1; #1/0; #2/0; #4/0
* Sinkers: 1 3/4 Oz. (50 g ); 3 1/2 Oz. (100 g)
* Open Feeders: 2 Oz. (60 g)
* Closed Feeders: 3 1/2 Oz. (100 g)
* Simple Bells: 1
* Jig Heads: JigHead 1/2 Oz. (14 g), #2/0; JigHead 3/4 Oz. (21 g), #3/0
* Worms: Worm 5" (12.5 cm) (x2); Worm 6" (15 cm)
* Spinnerbaits: Spinnerbait 3/4 Oz. (21 g) #3/0 (x2)
* Spinners: Nano Spinner 1/8 Oz. (4 g), #1 (x2); Barbless Nano Spinner 1/5 Oz. (6 g), #1/0 (x2)
* Spoons: Narrow Spoon 1/4 Oz. (7 g), #1/0 (x2); Single Spoon 1 Oz. (28 g), #2/0 (x2)
* Baits: Red Worms; Maggots; Semolina Balls; Caster Maggots; Bloodworms; Wax Worms; Marshmallows; Small Minnows; Pinkies; Night Crawlers
* Groundbaits: Crimson Cold Water Golden, Active Feeder Golden, Black Roacher Golden, Universal Mixture Golden
* Aromas: Molasses Caramelized Golden; Sweet Crucian Golden; Spicy Roach Golden

EQUIPMENT
* Advanced Angler Cap - Tackles: 2
* MagFin™ Advanced Angler Jacket - Tackles: 20
* Flaggmann™ Advanced Rod Case - Rods: 3
* GarryScott™ FishCabin M Plus - Max Single Fish Weight: 66 Lb. (30 kg); Total Fish Weight: 154 Lb. (70 kg)

POND PASSES (7 days):
* Lesní Víla Fishery (Czech)
* Mudwater River (Missouri)
* Emerald Lake (New York)
* Rocky Lake (Colorado)
* Neherrin River (North Carolina)
* Ghent–Terneuzen Canal (Netherlands)

FISHING LICENSES (7 days):
* Advanced Czech License
* Advanced Missouri License
* Advanced New York License
* Advanced Colorado License
* Advanced North Carolina License
* Advanced Texas License
* Advanced Netherlands License

MONSTER MISSIONS UNLOCK
* Lesní Víla Perch Bully Monster
* Mudwater Dendrofin Monster
* Rocky Tyrannotrout Monster
* Emerald Pikeslasher Monster
* Ghent-Terneuzen Eel Cannibal Monster

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia Geforce 8600/9600GT (Driver v331), AMD HD 2xxx-4xxx (Driver mesa 10.5.9), AMD HD 5xxx+ (Driver mesa 10.5.9 or Catalyst 15.7), Intel HD 3000 (Driver mesa 10.6)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 1,6 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 6000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.11 El Capitan
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M370X 2 GB GDDR5
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

name: Fishing Planet: Advanced Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: OS Version - Windows 7, 8, 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card Intel HD4600 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7,8,10 x64
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: Take your fishing experience to the NEXT LEVEL instantaneously — with the ADVANCED FP PACK! The Advanced FP Pack features FOUR powerful Advanced Edition rod and reel combos, along with awesome Advanced Edition fishing apparel — an all round basic set of superb equipment!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Italian, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
